org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter

注释类型 SpringJUnitConfig


  • @ExtendWith(value=SpringExtension.class)
 @ContextConfiguration
 @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface SpringJUnitConfig
    @SpringJUnitConfig is a composed annotation that combines @ExtendWith(SpringExtension.class) from JUnit Jupiter with @ContextConfiguration from the Spring TestContext Framework.
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Sam Brannen
    另请参阅:
    ExtendWith, SpringExtension, ContextConfiguration, SpringJUnitWebConfig

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      java.lang.Class<?>[] classes
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.classes().
      boolean inheritInitializers
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.inheritInitializers().
      boolean inheritLocations
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.inheritLocations().
      java.lang.Class<? extends ApplicationContextInitializer<?>>[] initializers
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.initializers().
      java.lang.String[] locations
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.locations().
      java.lang.String name
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.name().
      java.lang.Class<?>[] value
      Alias for ContextConfiguration.classes().

    • 元素详细资料

      • value

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class,
          attribute="classes")
public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] value
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.classes().
        默认值:
        {}

      • classes

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract java.lang.Class<?>[] classes
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.classes().
        默认值:
        {}

      • locations

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract java.lang.String[] locations
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.locations().
        默认值:
        {}

      • initializers

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ApplicationContextInitializer<?>>[] initializers
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.initializers().
        默认值:
        {}

      • inheritLocations

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract boolean inheritLocations
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.inheritLocations().
        默认值:
        true

      • inheritInitializers

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract boolean inheritInitializers
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.inheritInitializers().
        默认值:
        true

      • name

        @AliasFor(annotation=ContextConfiguration.class)
public abstract java.lang.String name
        Alias for ContextConfiguration.name().
        默认值:
        ""
